title: 115_hr1119
content: This measure has not been amended since it was reported to the House on January 12, 2018. Satisfying Energy Needs and Saving the Environment Act or the SENSE Act This bill eases emission limits for hazardous air pollutants from electric utility steam generating units that convert coal refuse into energy. The Environmental Protection Agency must allow utilities to select a standard for either hydrogen chloride or sulfur dioxide with which to comply from a list of specified standards.
